title: Wetzel: The NFL's Bill Belichick skepticism is being validated in Chapel Hill
content: An NFC personnel director told ESPN that Belichick comes up "within the first five minutes" of every conversation.

title: Fins' McDaniel shuts down 'baseless' trade rumors
content: Dolphins coach Mike McDaniel shut down "baseless" trade rumors Friday, saying the team is not currently looking to trade any players.

title: Commanders WR McLaurin out 4th straight game
content: Commanders receiver Terry McLaurin will miss his fourth consecutive game with a right quad injury, coach Dan Quinn said Friday.

title: Rams rule star WR Nacua (ankle) out vs. Jags
content: The Rams have ruled leading receiver Puka Nacua out for Sunday's matchup against the Jaguars in London, coach Sean McVay announced Friday.

title: Myers leaves ESPN, joins Harris-led sports group
content: Ex-Warriors GM Bob Myers is leaving ESPN to become president of sports for Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment.

title: Records: Gambling group targeted college hoops
content: As the NCAA and federal authorities investigate alleged point-shaving in college basketball, the documents reveal new details about the behavior of an alleged gambling syndicate and the games suspected members targeted.

title: Pulisic suffered low-grade hamstring tear with U.S.
content: Christian Pulisic was confirmed by AC Milan on Friday to have injured his right hamstring while playing in a friendly for the United States this week.

title: Flacco savors Bengals' victory after uncertainty
content: Following his benching in Cleveland and his trade to Cincinnati, Joe Flacco said the opportunity to lead the Bengals to a comeback win was "pretty special."

title: F1 announces new Apple TV U.S. broadcast deal
content: Apple TV has signed an exclusive deal to be the broadcaster of Formula 1 in the United States from 2026, it was announced on Friday.

content: Jakobi Meyers to the NFC East? Trey Hendrickson and Jaelan Phillips to the same team? Russell Wilson to a contender? Let's build 13 win-win trades.

content: Ole Miss-Georgia, Bama-Tennessee, LSU-Vandy, plus USC-Notre Dame and more make for a jam-packed weekend.

content: As Curry and Kerr enter their 12th season together, they reflect on what forged their bond and what comes next.

content: We explore what has happened (good or bad) for seven particular teams -- and predict whether it'll continue.

content: Perfect Bayern, unbeaten Dortmund, first vs. second: Der Klassiker doesn't need extra fanfare. This is a meeting of the best in the Bundesliga.

content: Miller Moss' career at USC crashed last year. How far will Louisville's QB go to stay after his NFL dreams?

content: Multiple teams are rocking throwbacks in Week 8 of the college football season, led by the Florida Gators.

content: Where do you begin with fixing Man United? From coaching to player identification to infrastructure, what's the first place to start? We asked some industry insiders and experts for their takes.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye Dortmund center back Nico Schlotterbeck
content: Liverpool are prepared to pursue Borussia Dortmund center back Nico Schlotterbeck. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Talent, emotional intelligence and a lifetime of sacrifice have made Oscar Piastri a F1 title favorite
content: There's no doubting Oscar Piastri's talent, but what's set him apart in his F1 title quest is his ability to control his emotions.

content: Our experts dive into the lines and player props that offer value for Week 7 and share their tips and bets.

title: Delhi-Dhaka spat: Deaths of 3 B'deshis in Tripura sparks tiff; MEA reacts
content: India and Bangladesh are embroiled in a diplomatic dispute following the killing of three Bangladeshis in Tripura. Dhaka condemned the "brutal beating and killing" as a "grave violation of human rights," while India stated the deceased were "smugglers" who attacked villagers. New Delhi urged Dhaka to uphold border sanctity and prevent cross-border crimes.

title: 'Not sustainable': Trump admits folly of tariffs; what 'forced' trade war with China
content: President Trump declared his proposed 100% tariff on Chinese goods unsustainable, blaming Beijing's unfair practices for forcing his hand. He accused China of years of exploitation and stated that only strength is respected. Despite this, a potential tariff pause was hinted at, with 85 senators reportedly backing up to 500% tariffs on Chinese purchases of Russian oil.

title: Bezos' ex-wife cuts Amazon share; Slashes stake by $12.6bn; Increases charity
content: MacKenzie Scott has significantly reduced her Amazon stake, cutting holdings by nearly 42% to $12.6 billion. This reduction occurred despite Amazon's stock performance and follows her extensive philanthropic efforts, which have heavily focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. The exact reasons for the stake reduction, whether sales or donations, remain unspecified.

title: Happy Dhanteras 2025: 50 best wishes, messages & quotes to share with loved ones
content: Diwali, the Festival of Lights, symbolizes the triumph of good over evil and light over darkness. The five-day celebration begins with Dhanteras, honoring Lord Dhanvantari and marking the start of prosperity. This year, Dhanteras falls on October 17, 2025, ushering in a period of auspicious beginnings and blessings.

title: Kohli, Rohit in 2027 ODI WC? Chief selector Agarkar reveals plan
content: Chief selector Ajit Agarkar clarified that Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are not on trial for the upcoming Australia ODI series, nor will it determine their 2027 World Cup chances. Their exceptional records mean they won't be judged on a single series, with Agarkar emphasising a balance of experience and youth for the team's future.

title: Zoho founder to take break; warns he‚Äôs at risk of ‚Äòcontradicting own principles‚Äô
content: Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu is stepping back from external commitments to focus on coding, a move driven by his principle of practicing what he preaches. He aims to complete crucial product development, including end-to-end encryption for Zoho's Arattai messaging app, a feature designed to enhance user data privacy by storing information solely on devices.

title: Ex-Trump aide surrenders: Bolton charged in criminal case - all you need to know
content: Former National Security Adviser John Bolton surrendered Friday to face charges of mishandling classified information. The indictment alleges he shared sensitive intelligence notes with his wife and daughter for a book, violating the Espionage Act. Bolton denies wrongdoing, vowing to fight the charges and expose alleged presidential abuse of power.

title: Bihar polls: MGB misses 'deadline' for seat deal; does it spell big trouble?
content: Bihar's opposition Mahagathbandhan faces scrutiny over delayed seat-sharing talks, with the NDA appearing organized. Alliance leaders, however, insist the delay signifies expansion, not disarray, citing coordination complexities. Despite some candidate overlaps, leaders express confidence in forming a government, drawing parallels to past successful alliances.

title: Code Red at Google: ChatGPT beat Google; Sundar Pichai recalls
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai revealed an internal "code red" following OpenAI's ChatGPT launch, prompting founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin to return. The company dramatically reshaped its AI strategy, launching Bard (now Gemini) and reassigning over 20 AI initiatives to counter the existential threat to its search empire.

title: Agarkar on his role as chief selector: 'There is nothing else in your hand'
content: BCCI chief selector Ajit Agarkar described his role as the most challenging compared to playing and commentary. He highlighted the immense pressure and responsibility of shaping careers, acknowledging that decisions can impact players significantly. Agarkar also addressed the popularity of cricket in India, leading to widespread criticism of selection choices.

title: 'Like a movie': Cop saves drunk woman from a fiery car crash ‚Äì Caught on cam
content: A Mesquite police officer, Tyler Ingram, heroically rescued a suspected drunk driver from her burning car on I-30. Bodycam footage captured Ingram forcing open the door and pulling the woman to safety moments before the vehicle was engulfed in flames. The woman, who sustained injuries, is expected to recover and faces DWI charges.

title: NBA trade rumors: Warriors eye $186M bucks star for big 3 with Curry, Butler
content: Golden State Warriors are reportedly considering a seismic trade, sending Draymond Green and other assets to Milwaukee for superstar Giannis Antetokounmpo. This bold move could redefine the franchise's future, potentially extending their championship window beyond the Stephen Curry era. The proposed deal offers a chance for a new era, balancing loyalty with a pursuit of generational talent.

title: Brewers ‚ÄòKaren‚Äô fired after racist rant video IDs her as Shannon Kobylarczyk
content: A Wisconsin woman, Shannon Kobylarczyk, faced swift repercussions after a viral video captured her racist tirade against a U.S. war veteran at a baseball game. Her employer, ManPowerGroup, terminated her employment, and she resigned from the Make-A-Wish Foundation board. The incident highlights the rapid online response to displays of hate.

title: Puka Nacua injury update: Rams WR doubtful for Week 7 vs Jaguars
content: Los Angeles Rams star receiver Puka Nacua is in serious doubt for Week 7 due to an ankle injury. While coach Sean McVay termed it 'day-to-day,' the team might rest him ahead of their Week 8 bye, allowing him two weeks to recover. This strategic move aims to ensure his full performance for the remainder of the season.

title: Why firecrackers are horrible for dogs
content: For millions of dogs, Diwali is not a festival of light. It is a night of noise and terror, a prolonged panic attack that no amount of comforting words can soothe. What we call tradition, they experience as trauma. And the reason lies not in weakness or over-sensitivity, but in the very biology that humans helped shape ‚Äî a physiology honed over millennia for survival, now caught in a storm it cannot understand.

title: Vande Bharat sleeper train 2025: First look, features, routes
content: India's premium overnight Vande Bharat Sleeper train is set to revolutionize long-distance travel. Featuring a 16-coach prototype with AC 3-Tier, AC 2-Tier, and AC First Class, it will accommodate over 1,100 passengers. Designed for speeds up to 180 km/h, the train promises enhanced comfort and modern amenities, with initial routes connecting Delhi to Ahmedabad, Bhopal, and Patna.

title: UK launches first digital ID: Is it similar to India's Aadhaar? Full details
content: The UK government has launched a digital ID scheme, initially for former armed services members, with plans to expand it for all citizens to verify their right to work. This app-based system aims to reduce illegal immigration by making it harder to use stolen or borrowed National Insurance numbers for employment.

title: 2027 ODI WC? Head makes bold Kohli, Rohit future predictions
content: Australian cricketer Travis Head lauded Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma as premier white-ball talents, with Kohli hailed as the greatest. Head expressed admiration for Sharma's batting, seeing him as a role model for openers. Axar Patel echoed confidence in their readiness for the upcoming India-Australia series, highlighting their professional approach and recent strong performances.

title: ‚ÄòNever gave anaesthesia‚Äô: Cops probe another woman's role in Bengaluru doctor‚Äôs murder
content: A surgical resident, Dr. Mahendra Reddy G S, has been arrested and remanded in custody for the alleged murder of his wife, dermatologist Dr. Kritika M Reddy. He is accused of administering an anaesthetic overdose, with forensic reports confirming the presence of Propofol in her viscera. Investigators are examining his motive and how he procured the drug.

title: UPenn on Trump ‚Äòcompact‚Äô: Alma mater says no; chooses academic freedom over control
content: The University of Pennsylvania, Donald Trump‚Äôs alma mater, has rejected his administration‚Äôs ‚ÄúCompact for Academic Excellence,‚Äù a proposed funding-linked deal requiring tuition freezes, limits on international students, and protections for conservative speech. Joining MIT, Brown, and USC, UPenn cited academic freedom and autonomy concerns, marking a symbolic blow as Trump‚Äôs former university rebuffs his education policy.

title: Exclusive | Sharad Kelkar reveals what he gifts his wife her every Dhanteras
content: Actor Sharad Kelkar is gearing up for Diwali, highlighting his wife Keerti as the 'light of his life' who simplifies his world. He revealed that Keerti selects her own Dhanteras gift, a tradition he meticulously plans for. Kelkar also emphasizes extending Diwali's joy and prosperity to his long-serving staff with bonuses and gifts, believing the festival signifies happiness for everyone.

title: Agarkar reveals why Shami missed Australia tour: 'We were desperate'
content: Former chief selector Ajit Agarkar cited fitness concerns for Mohammed Shami's exclusion from the England series and the recent Australia ODI tour. Shami, however, expressed his readiness to play, stating his participation in domestic matches indicates his fitness. Agarkar indicated that Shami's availability for future tours depends on his fitness over the next two months.

title: BBC Gaza documentary controversy: Why Ofcom called it a 'serious breach'
content: BBC has been found to have misled audiences by UK regulator Ofcom over its Gaza documentary. The 13-year-old narrator's father was a Hamas official, a crucial detail omitted. This ruling, a rare and serious rebuke, highlights transparency issues and has intensified scrutiny on the BBC's journalistic integrity in sensitive reporting.

title: Happy Diwali 2025: Top 60 wishes, messages to light up the celebrations
content: Diwali, the festival of lights, is celebrated with great fervor, symbolizing hope, knowledge, and love. Families gather to share happiness, exchange gifts, and create lasting memories. The article provides 130+ wishes, messages, and quotes to help express gratitude and spread joy during this auspicious occasion.

title: Spy games: The Chinese espionage case that is rocking UK govt - explained
content: A high-stakes legal battle is unfolding in Britain after a spying case against two Britons collapsed. Accused of espionage for China, the prosecution faltered on a technicality. This has sparked sharp criticism from intelligence chiefs and government officials who label China a significant threat. The incident raises crucial questions about national security and the UK's approach to China.

title: IND vs AUS: Shocking numbers! Rohit-Virat fever reaches Australia
content: The Men's ODI Series between Australia and India has officially launched at Perth Stadium. Players from both nations gathered for a photo session, celebrating their historic cricket rivalry. The series begins on Saturday, October 19, at Perth Stadium. Over 175,000 tickets have already been sold for the white-ball series, indicating significant fan interest.

title: Dhanteras 2025: Date, shubh muhurat to bring home Laxmi-Ganesh idols, broomsticks
content: Dhanteras, on October 18, 2025, marks the auspicious start of Diwali festivities, symbolizing the victory of light over darkness. Families traditionally buy gold, silver, and idols of Lakshmi and Ganesh, believed to invoke prosperity and remove obstacles. The day also involves rituals and purchasing broomsticks to sweep away negativity, setting a positive tone for the celebrations.

title: Dense forests no longer safe for Naxals; over 200 Maoists lay down arms
content: Over 200 Maoists, including key figures, surrendered in Chhattisgarh's Bastar, marking a significant turning point in the fight against Naxalism. Union Home Minister Amit Shah declared Abujhmarh and North Bastar free from Naxal terror, attributing the success to the government's dual approach of pressure and surrender incentives.

title: 'Shameful decision!': Fans banned; Israeli fans attack British officials
content: British officials face pressure to reverse a ban on Maccabi Tel Aviv supporters attending a match at Aston Villa due to security concerns. Israel's foreign minister called the decision "shameful," while the UK Prime Minister emphasised zero tolerance for antisemitism. Police cited intelligence and previous violent incidents as reasons for the high-risk classification.

title: Gwalior hospital: Worms found in govt-supplied kids‚Äô Azithromycin syrup
content: In a startling turn of events, authorities in Madhya Pradesh have issued a statewide warning following the alarming discovery of worms in a government-provided antibiotic syrup intended for children. Health officials have immediately ceased the distribution of the implicated Azithromycin Oral Suspension and have launched an extensive investigation.

title: 'Fake news': Virat Kohli's brother on Instagram; hits out at 'misinformation'
content: Virat Kohli's brother, Vikas, sarcastically addressed rampant misinformation and fake news circulating online. This social media post emerged amidst reports suggesting the cricketer and his wife, Anushka Sharma, were planning a permanent move to the UK, even transferring power of attorney for their Gurugram property.

title: MrBeast meets Bollywood trio SRK, Salman and Aamir
content: Internet sensation MrBeast, also known as Jimmy Donaldson, has ignited a frenzy with a picture alongside Bollywood titans Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, and Aamir Khan in Saudi Arabia. His cryptic caption, "Hey India, should we all do something together?", has fans buzzing with speculation about a massive upcoming collaboration, potentially uniting global and Indian entertainment.

title: Hayden on India captaincy - 'Rohit becomes vulnerable because of ... '
content: Former Australian cricketer Matthew Hayden shared his thoughts on Rohit Sharma's ODI captaincy change. He noted the selectors' focus on age and the strategic move to bring Shubman Gill into leadership. Hayden highlighted the immense experience of Rohit and Virat Kohli returning for the Australian series. He also emphasized India's balanced team composition, blending youth and experience.

title: Indian pharma eyes Russian market: Firms explore localised production
content: Indian pharmaceutical companies are exploring opportunities to establish production facilities across Russia, with productive negotiations underway for joint ventures. This move aims to leverage India's expertise and Russia's market potential, fostering self-sufficiency in pharmaceuticals and other key sectors through complementary strengths.

title: 'Rammed vehicle into wall': Suicide attack on Pak army's camp; viral video shows huge blast
content: A deadly suicide attack struck a Pakistan military camp in North Waziristan on Friday, killing seven soldiers. Terrorists attempted to storm the facility, with one detonating an explosives-laden vehicle. This incident follows intense clashes between Pakistan and Afghanistan. A fragile ceasefire is now in place, brokered by the Afghan Taliban regime.

title: Taylor Swift, Travis Kelce‚Äôs rumored prenup to protect $1.6bn empire before ‚ÄòI do‚Äô
content: As Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce prepare for their wedding, speculation surrounds their reported prenup. With Swift's $1.6 billion net worth and Kelce's $70 million, a "Title Controls" agreement is likely, ensuring individual assets like Swift's music catalog and Kelce's businesses remain separate. This smart financial planning protects their empires.

title: No proportional representation for Muslims among Bihar poll candidates
content: Muslims make up almost one in five of Bihar voters; so far, JD(U) is fielding four Muslims, RJD has named three, Congress has named four, and BJP none; Prashant Kishor‚Äôs new party has named 21 Muslim candidates

title: A.P. Police arrest two persons from U.P., Maharashtra for terror links
content: They are found to be active members of WhatsApp groups and channels of Jaish-e-Mohammed and were planning to radicalise youth and also take military training in Pakistan to wage a war against India, says SP

title: Contractors‚Äô association gives December deadline to government to clear pending bills
content: Karnataka State Contractors Association has warned that it will release the ‚Äòcorruption report card‚Äô of the government in December, if the pending amount of ‚Çπ33,000 crore

content: MEA Spokesperson says the incident highlights the need for Bangladesh to undertake necessary measures to uphold the sanctity of the international border and support the construction of fencing where needed to prevent cross-border crimes and smuggling

title: Tamil Nadu government announces holiday on October 21
content: The State government has taken the decision considering the convenience of students, teachers, and government employees to return from their natives after Deepavali

content: At National Conclave in New Delhi, President says the government aims to build self-reliance and participation among tribal communities through the programme

content: The trio‚Äôs arrest comes a month after a woman from Kollam, Sujitha G., was arrested in the case; as many as 250 SIM cards, 40 mobile phones, laptops, and debit cards seized from a flat used by the accused

title: Delhi HC imposes ‚Çπ20,000 costs on Centre for concealing facts in Sameer Wankhede‚Äôs promotion case
content: Bench said it expected that the Centre would disclose all the facts truthfully before filing the plea

title: Andhra Pradesh government introduces new performance evaluation model for Health Department
content: Health Minister Satya Kumar asks department heads to self-assess their performance for the first six months of the current financial year and submit a detailed feedback based on 20 key parameters, the aim of which is to ensure accountability and measurable progress in public health services

title: Petitioners disappointed at HC decision to lift toll collection ban at Paliyekkara
content: Petitioners plan to explore scope of moving Supreme Court and say suspension period had been ‚Äúa lesson‚Äù for both the National Highways Authority of India and the contractor. The order came even as the Thrissur-Angamaly stretch of the NH continues to witness heavy congestion

title: BJP MLA‚Äôs remarks on Hindu girls and gyms draw sharp criticism
content: Gopichand Padalkar‚Äôs comments in Beed spark outrage; accused of promoting communal division and moral policing

title: 2025 local body polls: reservation wards in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation finalised
content: Kattayikonam, Pangappara, Attukal, Alathara and Kulathur are the SC Women reservation wards and Kachani, Peroorkada, Arannur and Cheruvaickal, the SC reservation wards

title: ‚ÄòUse AI as a support tool, rigorous verification a hallmark of journalism‚Äô¬†
content: Warning against fake news, Adviser to Government K. Keshava Rao urged journalists to maintain accuracy, authenticity, and ethical standards while using AI as a supportive tool in news gathering

title: Congress leaders in Kerala find revamped PAC unwieldy
content: Many leaders feel that the oversized political affairs committee, which now has 39 members, does not inspire confidence. They resent that those in key positions in the Central leadership are eager to induct their loyalists instead of forming a lean body of leaders with political heft. Some leaders are planning to raise the issue with the party high command ¬†

title: Priyank Kharge is suffering from RSS phobia, says Siddalinga Swami
content: ‚ÄòHe should realise that the State has lost a massive Google investment to neighbouring Andhra Pradesh and start focusing on development‚Äô

title: Belgian Court Approves Fugitive Jeweller Mehul Choksi's Extradition To India
content: A court in Belgium on Friday approved the extradition of fugitive diamond trader Mehul Choksi to India. The court in Antwerp ruled that Choksi's arrest by Belgian police, based on India's request, was valid.

title: Pak Airstrikes Hit Afghanistan, Truce "Broken": Senior Taliban Official
content: Pakistan carried out strikes in a border province in Afghanistan late Friday, breaking a ceasefire that had brought two days of calm to the border, a senior Taliban official said

title: "Stuffed My Face With Kulfi": Rishi Sunak To NDTV On Love For "Mithai"
content: Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak revealed that "mithai" is the most important thing to him while referring to his visit to Delhi's Bengali Market at the NDTV World Summit 2025.

title: Lebanese Judge Orders Hannibal Gaddafi's Release On $11 Million Bail
content: A judge on Friday ordered the release on bail of Hannibal Gaddafi, son of deposed Libyan ruler Muammar Gaddafi, after nearly a decade of pre-trial detention in Lebanon.

title: "Ghost-Like Sounds": Cambodia Accuses Thailand Of Psychological Warfare
content: Former Cambodian Prime Minister Hun Sen has accused Thailand of broadcasting "ghost-like" sounds along a disputed border.

title: Brown Sugar Worth Rs 3.5 Crore Seized In UP, 1 Arrested
content: The Uttar Pradesh Special Task Force (STF) has seized 3.44 kg of brown sugar worth around Rs 3.5 crore and arrested one person in the state's Bahraich district on Friday.

title: Zubeen Garg's Bandmate And Co-Singer Sent To 14-Day Judicial Custody
content: Two of the seven suspects in the death case of Assam's cultural icon and singer Zubeen Garg have been sent to 14-day judicial custody.

title: India In No Mood To Stop, Says PM Modi At NDTV World Summit
content: The government has succeeded in reducing the number of Maoist-hit districts, across the country, to just 11 from 125 a decade ago, underlined Prime Minister Narendra Modi at NDTV World Summit in Delhi.

title: Ex-Trump NSA John Bolton Pleads Not Guilty In Classified Information Case
content: John Bolton arrived at a federal courthouse on Friday to surrender to authorities on charges accusing the former Trump administration national security adviser, turned critic of the president, of mishandling classified information.

title: CBI Conducts Raids Across Punjab, Chandigarh In IPS Officer Bribery Case
content: The Central Bureau of Investigation on Friday conducted extensive searches across Punjab and Chandigarh in connection with a bribery case involving a DIG of Punjab Police.

title: "From Fragile 5 To Top 5": PM On 'Unstoppable Bharat' At NDTV World Summit
content: From a fragile five economy before 2014, India has emerged as one of the top five economies of the world, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has said, outlining the country's growth journey in 11 years.

title: NDTV World Summit 2025 LIVE: World Sees India As Responsible Partner, Says PM Modi
content: NDTV Global World Summit 2025 LIVE Updates: The 2025 edition of the NDTV World Summit - NDTV's flagship event - began on Friday, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi delivering the keynote address.

title: "New India Doesn't Endure Terror Silently": PM Modi On Op Sindoor At NDTV World Summit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday said that the era of a "silent India" in the face of terrorism is over, asserting that the country now gives a "befitting response" to those who threaten its security.

title: OpenAI To Let ChatGPT Talk Dirty, But Only To Verified Adults
content: ChatGPT will be able to have kinkier conversations after OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced the artificial intelligence company will soon allow its chatbot to engage in "erotica for verified adults."

title: "No Foul Play Suspected": Singapore Police On Zubeen Garg's Death
content: According to the Singapore police, the completion of the investigation into the death of Zubeen Garg may take up to another three months.

title: "They Forced Me to Do That": Trump Defends 100% Tariffs On China
content: US President Donald Trump has said he had to impose steep tariffs on China after Beijing tightened export controls on rare earth minerals, a move that he described "he was forced to do."

title: Explained: What Could A Ukraine Peace Look Like?
content: US President Donald Trump has said he will meet Russian President Vladimir Putin in Budapest soon to discuss a way to end the war in Ukraine.

title: "Old Global Order Gone, There Will Be More Multipolarity": Rishi Sunak To NDTV On Tariffs
content: The old global order that people of his generation grew up with "is gone" and the focus will now be on multipolarity and domestic capabilities, former UK Prime Minister Sunak has said.

title: Leopard Suspected Of Killing 8-Year-Old Girl Captured In UP
content: A leopard believed to be responsible for the death of an eight-year-old girl was captured early Friday morning near a village under the North Nighasan forest range of the Dudhwa buffer zone, officials said.

title: Delhi Air Remains 'Poor' For Fourth Straight Day Ahead Of Diwali
content: Delhi's air quality remained in the 'poor' category for the fourth consecutive day on Friday as the city continued to reel under rising pollution levels in the run-up to Diwali.

title: GHMC Commissioner issues notices to waste management agencies for failure to clear garbage and debris
content: A performance review revealed that on October 16, garbage was cleared at only 1,879 of the total 2,532 garbage vulnerable points before the stipulated time

title: Any move to ban RSS will be against Constitution, says Santosh Hegde
content: The former Lokayukta has said that any such move by the State government will boomerang as the BJP will ban the Congress when it returns to power in the State

title: Japanese firm Toshiba to invest additional 35 billion yen on Hyderabad, Kawasaki units
content: The investment will be in the power transmission and distribution (T&D) equipment business and comes in the backdrop of accelerating global electricity demand

title: Food processing sector is one of Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs growth engines, says top official
content: Highlighting the features of AP Food Processing Policy 2024‚Äì29 and the emerging investment opportunities across the value chain, he says the government is committed to enabling investments and partnerships driving inclusive growth

title: ‚ÄòPaathirathri‚Äô movie review: An uninspiring crime procedural that fails to leave an impact
content: In following a genre by the book, Ratheena‚Äôs sophomore film Paathirathri fails to bring any novelty to the table or inject excitement to the proceedings

title: Bihar election | EC asks agencies to check transportation of cash and smuggled goods across international borders
content: The meeting was held in order to prepare a comprehensive road map to combat the pernicious effects of cash and other inducements in the Bihar election, the EC says

title: BJP government committed to welfare of farmers, youth and women: Haryana CM Saini
content: The CM says Scheduled Castes, who have long been deprived of their rightful opportunities, are now being empowered through increased participation in government jobs, panchayat, and local body elections

content: Quality power supply is the foundation for development in every sector, Deputy CM said at  a review of Electricity department

title: APSRTC employees plan State-wide protest for promotions from October 23

title: College football: Why Texas Tech-ASU is worth two bets this week
content: the market moves from Colorado State -1.5 to -2.5 . it feels reactionary after the Rams crushed Fresno State . the result was built on turnover luck and fluky short fields . there are lines that overreacted and matchups that look nothing like what the market thinks they are .

title: Premier League re-rank: Arsenal top; Spurs' unsustainable path
content: the premier league's new financial anchoring rule is proposed . it's a random, low-scoring sport where conversion rates fluctuate massively from game to game . there are so many ways you can get out over your skis by drawing too many conclusions before we get to Halloween .

title: Chargers' new 'Charger Power' alternate, Lions' all-black lead NFL Week 7 uniforms
content: it's the first time in franchise history the Chargers will wear a gold jersey . the look is meant to channel the energy and "progressive nature" of the air coryell days . on "Thursday Night Football," the Cincinnati Bengals are hosting their annual "White Bengal" game .

title: A perfect Berkeley paradox: Big-money college football and an antiestablishment protest
content: activists began a tree-sit in 2006 to protest the removal of an oak grove next to the stadium . the patch of campus had embodied one of the many contradictions of Berkeley . "it was like a fricking circus," Tedford said recently .

title: 2025-26 coaching hot seat, retirement guide
content: bob greene: the tectonic shift that deals and revenue sharing have sparked in college sports has not spared the men's basketball coaching carousel and the hot seat discussion . he says it's now clear that patience is at an all-time low if new hires aren't cutting it after two years, they're likely getting forced out the door or at least under significant pressure .

title: Mock draft: Betts, Fudd or Miles at No. 1?
content: the WNBA is negotiating a new collective bargaining agreement with the union . the draft lottery, expansion drafts for Toronto and Portland and a mammoth free agency will have to take place before the 2026 draft . five of our top six selections in this mock were eligible to go in the 2025 draft, but all opted to return for a return trip .

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 7
content: the playbook for week 7 kicks off with the Steelers at the Bengals . this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities and, of course, easy digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . we have folded the Shadow Reports into the game-by-game breakdowns here .

title: NHL Power Rankings: Canes on top, one futures bet for each team
content: a panel of ESPN hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . previous ranking: 2 Points percentage: 100% Hurricanes win the Stanley Cup (+800). the first two games showcased Carolina's depth .

title: Flacco finds vintage form as Bengals win battle of 40-something QBs
content: the Bengals beat the Pittsburgh Steelers 33-31 in an AFC North showdown . the Cincinnati Bengals traded for quarterback Joe Flacco . he threw for 342 yards and three touchdowns in the win .

title: Ranking the top 25 college football players midway through the 2025 season
content: a midseason top 25 is supposed to look like a major league baseball all-star team . it's hard to separate the flash in the pan from the real deal . a bunch of players we love didn't make the cut . the good news is that a few of the biggest names don't keep this hot start through December .

title: LCS Day 6 storylines, lineups, updates: Who will rule two-game Friday in MLB playoffs?
content: the Toronto Blue Jays extend their lead to 6‚Äì2 as Vladimir Guerrero Jr. goes deep in the sixth inning . the winning team moves one victory away from the World Series . defending champion los Angeles Dodgers could complete a sweep of the top-seeded Milwaukee Brewers .

title: Bontemps and Windhorst: The latest intel on the Lakers, Knicks, Rockets and more
content: the deadline for extensions for most eligible players is Monday at 6 p.m. ET . there's a lot of pessimism right now, even by normal standards . a star-studded free agent class in the summer of 2027 could all be available .

title: Week 8 preview: Ranking Heisman contenders, plus key matchups and top quotes
content: the third Saturday in October delivers a lot of good things in college football . the SEC figures to dominate the spotlight, as it often does, as Ole Miss and Georgia tangle between the hedges . there is also non-SEC action to monitor, including the USC - Notre Dame rivalry, which hopefully will extend beyond Saturday .
